name: Onward! (CSE 450A Final Project)
description:
Objective: Reach the Final Chest at the end of each level

Movement:

-A to move left

-D to move right

-W to jump

Weapons:

-Spacebar to attack

-S to equip Sword (hint: use it wisely....)

*Collect points by Killing Enemies and Finding Chests

**Click on Power-Up Buttons for Special Powers
